name: Toph Beifong / Avatar: the Last Airbender
description:
weight 0.7~0.75 is best.

I created this LoRA in response to a request.

1girl, solo, black hair, belt, short hair, blue eyes, hair bun, green hairband, blind, chinese clothes, green dress, short sleeves, pelvic curtain

This was a very difficult LoRA to create because the images in the dataset were all styled differently.

I apologize if you feel it doesn't look like the original Toph.
